name: Podium Bash
description:
Podium Bash is an extremely fun local multiplayer VR game! In the standard game mode one player in VR stands atop a podium armed with a bat and shield tasked with staying on top for as long as they can. Up to four players using controllers are tasked with knocking the VR player off the podium by shooting cannons at the VR player.Customisation
  • 9 unique bats, including base ball batt, hocky stick, and cactus!
  • 9 unique shields, including knight sheild, trojan shield, and floppy disk!
  • 5 unique cannon skins with custom cannon balls, such as a wheeley bin that fires bags of rubbish!
Gamemodes
  • Standard
